Metadata.Title: Pay Attention to the Warnings of Compilers and Linkers
Metadata.DirectLink: Pay Attention to the Warnings of Compilers and Linkers

Content.Data:
What to Do

Heed the warnings of compilers and linkers, since they may alert you to improper usage.

Examine compiler warnings closely and eliminate problems with potential security implications, such as signed / unsigned mismatch in memory operations, or the use of uninitialized variables. Even if the weakness is rarely exploitable, a single failure may lead to the compromise of the entire system.
